p: The present review summarizes the advantages of TCM in the prevention and treatment of COVID-19 and answers the following scientific questions: (1) How can we understand the origin of unprecedented new infectious diseases? (2) Why is the TCM so effective for preventing the spread of highly infectious viruses? (3) Which methods of TCM have achieved good results in the treatment of COVID-19? (4) What are the scientific nature and molecular mechanism of TCM in the treatment of COVID-19? (5) For the patients cured by TCM, will they recover Yang, have sequelae, or need to continue taking medicine after recovery?
